backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented landing-page features and their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining global warm-toned OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/landing/FaqSecti: FAQ section rendering an accordion with six questions and answers about DirectSell.AI.
frontend/src/components/landing/Features: Grid of six feature cards describing AI personalization, targeting, speed, and other benefits.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with branding, legal links, a tagline, and Caffeine.ai attribution using dynamic UTM parameters.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero section with headline, value proposition, CTAs, and hero illustration plus scroll-to-section behavior.
frontend/src/components/landing/HowItWor: Renders the “How It Works” section with five steps and example prompts, including clipboard copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes the full landing page by combining navigation, hero, how-it-works, features, use cases, FAQ, and footer components.
frontend/src/components/landing/TopNav.t: Provides a responsive top navigation bar with scroll-based styling and smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/components/landing/UseCases: Displays three business use-case cards with icons, descriptions, and benefit lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with a coral/terracotta palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, and existing features for building the DirectSell.AI landing page, including image needs and planned sections.
